General.Name: Tokyo Plast International Limited
General.Description: Tokyo Plast International Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of thermo food containers and coolers in India and internationally. It offers plastic thermoware products. The company was incorporated in 1992 is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

3.Name: Mr. Priyaj Haresh Shah
3.Title: Bus. Head & Additional Exec. Non-Independent Director
